import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./styles.css"; const NFTMint = ({ onAdd }) => { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [creator, setCreator] = useState('') const [category, setCategory] = useState('') const [supply, setSupply] = useState('') const [description, setDescription] = useState('') const [image, setImage] = useState('') const [previewImage, setPreviewImage] = useState('') const [file, setFile] = useState('') const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(!name) { alert('Missing name!!!') return } if(!creator) { alert('Missing creator!!!') return } if(category === '') { alert('Choose Category!!!') return } if(!supply) { alert('Missing supply!!!') return } if(!image) { alert('Missing image!!!') return } if(!file) { alert('Missing file!!!') return } onAdd({ name, creator, category, supply, description, image, file }) setName('') setCreator('') setCategory('') setSupply('') setDescription('') setImage('') setFile('') setPreviewImage('') } function preview() { if (previewImage==null) { return
Upload a file to see a preview
} return
{previewImage && ( )}
} return (
Lazy Mint on Rarible
( setImage(e.target.files[0]), setPreviewImage(URL.createObjectURL(e.target.files[0])) )}>
setFile(e.target.files[0])}>
setName(e.target.value)}>
setSupply(e.target.value)}/>
setCreator(e.target.value)}/>
setDescription(e.target.value)}/>
Image Preview
{preview()}
) } export default NFTMint;
